structuredData.headline: From Firebase/Redis to MySQL with PlanetScale
structuredData.description: Learn how I migrated my Next.js website to use MySQL with PlanetScale, resulting in 10x faster response times for my APIs.
structuredData.image: https://leerob.io/api/og?title=From Firebase/Redis to MySQL with PlanetScale
